caption:
When your tools do the heavy lifting, the blowout practically styles itself. 💨✨

To set and style this layered look, #OliviaGarden Educator @wsbeautytouch used the OG #MultiBrush round thermal brush and limited-edition Blossom #CeramicIon #SpeedXL Collection. Both tools offer ceramic coated barrels that heat up faster and retain heat longer for gentler *and* better styling. The difference? The MultiBrush features a detachable handle that allows you to leave the barrel in as you work.

Achieve smooth styling with serious volume, and pro-level shine. Shop the tools behind the transformation at the link in our bio. 🔗

#OliviaGarden #BeautyTools #Multibrush #ThermalBrush #HairStyling
